entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow late in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
